text: The Kia Pegas is a subcompact Sedan made by Kia since 2017 under the joint venture Yueda Kia a joint venture between Kia and Dongfeng which is a Chinese state-owned brand. == History and Features == The Kia Pegas was shown at the Auto Shanghai in 2017 it was targeted at young buyers it has a 1.4 liter petrol engine and also a 5-speed manual transmission and a 4-speed automatic transmission. the car however did not received a facelift. == Markets == The Kia Pegas is sold mainly in China but also in Africa and Middle East in Southeast Asia and Latin America where its sold in these four places as the Kia Soluto. == References == Pegas Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Kia Pegas
